programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Adam Driver and Penélope Cruz. Enzo Ferrari and his wife Laura have equal shares in their car-manufacturing company, but their marriage is in tatters following the death of their son, while the business is in financial peril. With the 1957 Mille Miglia endurance race looming, Enzo seeks victory for Ferrari, whatever the cost Michael Mann - Director, Michael Mann - Director Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Period epic starring Russell Crowe and Joaquin Phoenix. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". But the seemingly carefree congressman is stirred into action when socialite Joanne Herring draws his attention to the plight of the Afghan people suffering under Soviet occupation. With the help of a renegade CIA agent, he sets out to raise cash for the resistance fighters Mike Nichols - Director, Mike Nichols - Director Tom Hanks - Charlie Wilson Julia Roberts - Joanne Herring Philip Seymour Hoffman - Gust Avrakotos Amy Adams - Bonnie Bach Emily Blunt - Jane Liddle Ken Stott - Zvi Om Puri - President Zia Ned Beatty - Doc Long Shiri Appleby - Charlie's Angel Tom Hanks - Charlie Wilson Julia Roberts - Joanne Herring Philip Seymour Hoffman - Gust Avrakotos Amy Adams - Bonnie Bach Emily Blunt - Jane Liddle Ken Stott - Zvi Om Puri - President Zia Ned Beatty - Doc Long Shiri Appleby - Charlie's Angel.

programme.title: Armageddon Time
programme.desc: Jewish-American 11-year-old Paul Graff attends Public School 173 in 1980 New York, where dreams of NASA and space rockets are a distraction from the teachings of ill-tempered Mr Turkeltaub. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: In her turbulent life as a professional assassin, Scarlet was cruelly forced to abandon her daughter Sam and go on the run. Years later, despite the estrangement, Sam has also grown up into a cold-blooded hitwoman. After a high-stakes mission spins out of control, Sam has no choice but to go rogue. This ultimately leads her back to her mother and her former sidekicks, who join forces against those who took everything from them. programme.desc: Armen is a land crab who lives under a boardwalk at the Jersey Shore. When he falls for Ramona, a sea crab tourist, tensions between their friends and families rise. programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Action fantasy starring Christian Bale. When the wealthy parents of young Bruce Wayne are killed in front of him during a street robbery, the traumatised youth becomes bitter and eaten up with a desire for revenge. After a period in the Far East where he learns disciplined fighting skills and the power to channel his rage from the enigmatic Henri Ducard, the now adult Wayne returns to a Gotham City riddled with corruption and embarks on a crusade to cleanse the metropolis of crime under the guise of "the Batman" Christopher Nolan - Director, Christopher Nolan - Director Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra 'Cassie' Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. A routine call-out almost ends in tragedy and Cassie experiences disorienting visions which suggest she is predisposed to glimpse the future and subtly alter the course of history through her actions. This magical clairvoyance pinpoints Ezekiel Sims before he attempts to kill three young women, Julia Cornwall, Mattie Franklin and Anya Corazon. programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Action fantasy starring Christian Bale. When the wealthy parents of young Bruce Wayne are killed in front of him during a street robbery, the traumatised youth becomes bitter and eaten up with a desire for revenge. After a period in the Far East where he learns disciplined fighting skills and the power to channel his rage from the enigmatic Henri Ducard, the now adult Wayne returns to a Gotham City riddled with corruption and embarks on a crusade to cleanse the metropolis of crime under the guise of "the Batman" Christopher Nolan - Director, Christopher Nolan - Director Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill.

programme.desc: A young girl wishes to become an IPS officer despite the opposition from her conservative father, who thinks a woman's place is in kitchen and struggles to achieve her dream.

programme.title: Milenge Milenge
programme.desc: Hoping that destiny will reunite them, a couple, on the verge of getting married, attempt to locate each other. Starring Shahid Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor.

programme.title: Babumoshai Bandookbaaz
programme.desc: The film is a quirky ride of a reputed contract killer, Babu, and revolves around love, friendship, rivalries, and revenge.

programme.title: Yaara
programme.desc: The movie is a crime saga about two friends who once ruled the smuggling business and are now struggling to start life afresh.

programme.title: Hum Kisi Se Kum Nahin
programme.desc: A 1977 romantic tale about Kajal's (Kajal Kiran) search for her childhood friend Sanjay (Tariq) to marry him! Will destiny bring them together? R. D. Burman shines again.

programme.title: Zamane Ko Dikhana Hai
programme.desc: Kanchan (Padmini Kolhapure) falls for Ravi (Rishi Kapoor), but is unaware that he's also the son of the man who had killed her sister and brother-in-law. A 1981 love story.

programme.title: Prem Rog
programme.desc: At the Filmfare Awards 1983, Padmini Kolhapure won the 'Best Actress' award, Raj Kapoor won the 'Best Director and Editor' award, Santosh Anand won the 'Best Lyricist' award.

programme.title: Karz
programme.desc: (Movie @6) The duo Laxmikant - Pyarelal won 'Best Music Director' award at the Filmfare Awards - 1981.

programme.title: Bobby
programme.desc: (1973) A drama about first love. Raj Kapoor directs Rishi Kapoor and Dimple as teenagers who fall in love but are opposed by their parents. Superb music by Laxmikant Pyarelal.

programme.title: Saaho
programme.desc: While trying to catch a smart thief, an undercover agent and his partner realise that the case is linked to the murder of a crime lord.

programme.title: Honeymoon Travels PVT. LTD
programme.desc: Vikram Chatwal won Breakthrough Role - Actor in Annual Central European Bollywood Awards, India 2008.

programme.title: Wedding Pulav
programme.desc: Aditya and Anushka are in love with each other but unaware of their own feelings. The realisation dawns upon them only when they begin feeling jealous of each other's partners.

programme.title: Besharam
programme.desc: Digvijay Singh falsely implicates Ramchandra in a corruption case, which leads to the latter committing suicide. However, his son, Ram Kumar, vows to avenge his father's death.

programme.title: Murder at Teesri Manzil 302
programme.desc: When a businessman's wife gets kidnapped, the investigating officer finds something unusual about the case. Will the officer solve the mystery?

programme.title: Lakshya
programme.desc: This movie was so famous for its songs and choreography and it also won many awards inc. Best Cinematographer, Best Choreography.

programme.title: Chhoriya Chhoron Se Kam Nahi Hoti
programme.desc: (2019) (Movie @6) A young girl wishes to become an IPS officer despite the opposition from her conservative father, who thinks a woman's place is in kitchen and struggles to achieve her dream.

programme.title: Velle
programme.desc: Three criminals, a runaway girl, her three best friends, an aspiring director and a star cross path due to an incident. Will they come off better for it or worse?

programme.title: Thank God
programme.desc: An egotistical real estate broker comes face-to-face with God after meeting with an accident. Soon, he is forced to play a game that will put him either in heaven or hell.

programme.title: Apna Sapna Money Money
programme.desc: (2006) A tale of several characters who are in a mad race to be rich but discover that the more one chases money, the harder it is to catch.

programme.title: Vivah: Journey From Engagement to Marriage
programme.sub-title: (2006) Poonam is to marry Prem. However, an accident occurs and Poonam might be scarred for life. Prem's love for her wi
programme.desc: Shahid Kapoor, Amrita Rao.

programme.title: Sarkar 3
programme.desc: Gandhi seeks Sarkar's help to evict the slum dwellers. When Sarkar asks for compensation, Gandhi refuses and goes to an oppostion leader. But Sarkar won't let Gandhi succeed.

programme.title: Aap Aye Bahar Ayi
programme.desc: Kumar and Rohit, who are childhood friends, soon turn enemies when Kumar molests Rohit's fiancee out of jealousy. She feels unworthy of Rohit and calls off the wedding.

programme.title: Teen Patti
programme.desc: Shraddha Kapoor won the 'Favourite Promising Actress' award at the Lions Gold Awards 2011.

programme.title: Teri Meri Kahaani
programme.desc: A 2012 release. The story takes us through a journey of eternal love between a couple who have vowed to love each other not only in this life but in every life to follow.

programme.title: Khichdi 2
programme.desc: (Movie @6) When an intelligence agent discovers that Praful resembles the king of Paanthukistan, he enlists the help of the Parekh family to place Praful in the king's position and save his subjects.

programme.title: Satyaprem Ki Katha
programme.desc: A middle-class boy falls in love with Katha, who is coping with her breakup with Tapan. Through their heartfelt emotional journey they discover each other's life. (2023).

programme.title: Behen Hogi Teri
programme.desc: Gattu is head over heels in love with his neighbour, Binny. However, he becomes disheartened when her family and entire neighborhood treat him as her brother.

programme.title: Behan Hogi Teri
programme.desc: (2017) Gattu is head over heels in love with his neighbour, Binny. However, he becomes disheartened when her family and entire neighbourhood treat him as her brother.

programme.title: Jazbaa
programme.desc: (2015) Anuradha, an honest lawyer & single mother, finds herself in a do-or-die situation when her daughter Sanaya is kidnapped. Aishwarya Rai got an award for 'Power-Packed Performance of the Year'.

programme.title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
programme.desc: Arijit Singh won 'Best Playback Singer' award at the Apsara Film Producers Guild Awards 2016 and Amit Mishra won 'Best Music Debut' award at the Global Indian Music Awards 2016.

programme.title: Bareily Ki Barfi
programme.desc: This movie won many awards for different categories like Best Actress, Best Director, Best Scriptwriting, Best Production Design, Best Supporting Actor.

programme.title: Banjo
programme.desc: Taraat, a banjoist hailing from a poor background, and his associates get the offer of a lifetime when they are approached by Christina, a musician from the US.

programme.title: Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
programme.desc: A doctor who does not believe in Sai Baba's powers travels to Shirdi with his ill son. Soon, the doctor has to decide between Sai Baba and science to treat his ailing son.

programme.title: Don - The Chase Begins Again
programme.desc: Farhan Akhtar won an award for 'Best Asian Movie' at the Neuchotel International Fantastic Film Festival 2007.

programme.title: Antim: The Final Truth
programme.desc: (Saturday Superhits) Dadasaheb Phalke Film Festival 2022 - Aayush Sharma won 'Best Performance by an Actor in a Negative Role', Gold Awards 2022 - Mahima Makwana won 'Best Debut Actress of the Year'.

programme.title: Heer Tey Tedhi Kheer
programme.desc: (R) Fate brings a clumsy but cheerful Heer and DJ, a rigid man, together in marriage. Can Heer overcome the challenge of being a mother-in-law to his three older daughters-in-law?

programme.desc: (R) Gurman gives her son away to her friend Prabhjot and adopts her daughter, Keerat, in his place. Years later, Keerat marries Gurman's biological son. Will Prabhjot accept her as a daughter-in-law?

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: Jewish aristocrat Charlton Heston vows revenge when he is cast into slavery by treacherous Roman commander Stephen Boyd. Oscar-winning epic. Violent scenes. (1959)(202 mins).

programme.title: The Money Pit
programme.desc: New York couple Tom Hanks and Shelley Long find what seems like the perfect house, but before long they've been sucked into a renovation nightmare. Fun comedy. (1986)(88 mins).

programme.title: Rear Window
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock's masterpiece sees a housebound James Stewart convinced his neighbour has murdered someone, recruiting Grace Kelly to investigate. (1954)(112 mins).

programme.title: My Fair Lady
programme.desc: The multi-Oscar-winning classic musical about a pompous phonetics professor who tries to transform Cockney flower girl Audrey Hepburn into a member of high society. (1964)(170 mins).

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage returns from Vietnam to find his childhood friend, Birdy (Matthew Modine) psychologically crushed by the war. Haunting drama. Contains strong language/sex. (1984)(116 mins).

programme.desc: New York couple Tom Hanks and Shelley Long find what seems like the perfect house, but before long they've been sucked into a renovation nightmare. Fun comedy. (1986)(88 mins).

programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock's masterpiece sees a housebound James Stewart convinced his neighbour has murdered someone, recruiting Grace Kelly to investigate. (1954)(112 mins).

programme.title: Young Guns II
programme.desc: 80s Bratpacker Emilio Estevez rides high as Billy the Kid, with pals Kiefer Sutherland and Lou Diamond Phillips joining the outlaw trail for a quickdraw sequel. (1990)(100 mins).

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Police chief Roy Scheider hunts the killer shark menacing his peaceful seaside community. Spielberg's classic thriller. Moderate language/violent scenes/flashing images. (1975)(120 mins).

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Richard Gere is the male escort framed for murder in this stylised and sexy 80s thriller from Taxi Driver writer Paul Schrader. Contains discriminatory language. (1980)(112 mins).

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: In Roman Polanski's terrifying masterpiece, Mia Farrow realises her unborn child is the target of a satanic plot. With Ruth Gordon. Sex/mature themes/flashing images. (1968)(131 mins).

programme.title: My Fair Lady
programme.desc: The multi-Oscar-winning classic musical about a pompous phonetics professor who tries to transform Cockney flower girl Audrey Hepburn into a member of high society. (1964)(170 mins).

programme.title: Alfie (1966)
programme.desc: London lothario Michael Caine charms Shelley Winters, Eleanor Bron and Jane Asher in this swinging 60s drama nominated for five Oscars. Moderate violence/sex references. (1966)(108 mins).

programme.title: Bye Bye Birdie (1963)
programme.desc: A rock singer travels to a small Ohio town for his farewell television performance before being drafted. Comedy musical with Dick Van Dyke. (1963)(112 mins).

programme.title: Hatari
programme.desc: African-set adventure starring John Wayne as an animal hunter who encounters all kinds of obstacles in his quest to procure wildlife specimens for zoos. (1962)(150 mins).

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: Beach-bum Elvis Presley leaves the army and returns to sunny Hawaii, where his dad is soon on his back to get straight back into work. Musical comedy with Angela Lansbury. (1961)(97 mins).

programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. programme.desc: Special guests are joined by local journalists to discuss and debate all the latest news from Old Trafford. Ep 126.

programme.title: Born and Bred
programme.desc: Ex-British Army Sergeant Rick Clement was given the opportunity by United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer to share his story of overcoming adversity with the first-team players and staff back in 2020.

programme.title: My Love For Manchester - Bruno
programme.desc: Bruno talks all things Manchester and his love for his adopted city in this exclusive interview with our midfield maestro.

programme.title: Tony Whelan: The Godfather
programme.desc: Tony Whelan, our Academy Programme Advisor, speaks to Danny Webber about his legendary career as a Manchester United player, coach and mentor.

programme.title: Sir Alex: Life After Management
programme.desc: Jim Rosenthal sits down with Sir Alex Ferguson to discover what he's been doing since retiring and his thoughts on Louis van Gaal's era at Old Trafford.

programme.title: One Love: Rainbow Devils
programme.desc: Follow the heart-warming journeys of four members from the Rainbow Devils - the Official Manchester United LGBTQ+ Supporters Club.

programme.title: Floodlights: Garry Birtles
programme.desc: From our "When The Floodlights Fade" series. European Cup winner Birtles was a big money signing in 1980 from Nottingham Forest. But his United career never really took off; we ask him why.

programme.title: One Love: United Across Borders
programme.desc: Take a trip around the world, meeting Reds in Australia, Botswana, China, India, Ukraine and USA.

programme.title: Floodlights: Keith Gillespie
programme.desc: From our " When The Floodlights Fade" series. Former United winger Keith Gillespie had a great top flight career but controversies followed him throughout that time. This is his story.

programme.title: Wembley '77: Que Sera Sera..
programme.desc: Exclusive documentary looking back at one of the most significant FA Cup finals in United's history. This is the story of how the team bounced back from defeat, in this showpiece occasion.

programme.title: Jimmy Murphy
programme.desc: Follow the emotional journey of Jimmy Murphy's statue from its conception in Edinburgh to its final resting place, proudly on the Stretford End.

programme.title: United Ink
